select br.病人编号 as PatientCode, br.病人姓名 as PatientName, br.性别 as PatientSex, br.出生年月 as PatientBirthday, br.年龄 as PatientAge, br.身份证号 as PatientIDCard, br.社保卡号 as sbh, br.地址 as PatientAddress, br.联系电话 as PatientPhone, br.是否具有高度传染性 as GCRX,
zy.住院号 as InPatientCode, zy.病区 as WardArea, zy.床位 as BedNumber, zy.床位护士 as BedNurse, zy.病人编号 as ZYPatientCode from view_brjbxx br left join view_zyxx zy on br.病人编号=zy.病人编号 where 1=1 {0}

select --病人基本信息 br.病人编号 as VALUE,--病人编号 br.病人编号 as INPATIENTCODE,--病人编号 br.病人姓名 as NAME, --病人姓名 br.病人姓名 as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.性别 as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.出生年月 as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 br.年龄 as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 --住院信息 zy.住院号 as SocialSecurityCard, --住院号 zy.病区 as WARDAREA,--病区 zy.床位 as BEDNO, --床位 zy.床位护士 as BEDNURSE --床位护士 from view_brjbxx br left join view_zyxx zy on br.病人编号=zy.病人编号 where 1=1 {0}

select --手术信息 br.PatientCode as VALUE,--病人编号 br.PatientName as NAME, --病人姓名 br.PatientName as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.PatientSex as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.PatientBirthday as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 br.floor(months_between(sysdate,to_date(PatientBirthday,'yyyy-mm-dd'))/12) as PATIENTAGE,--年龄
ss.MedicalRecordCode as MEDICALRECORDCODE, --病案号 ss.OperationRoom as OPERATIONROOM, --手术室 ss.OperationDepartment as OPERATIONDEPARTMENT, --科室 ss.OperationDate as OPERATIONDATE, --手术时间 ss.OperationDoctor as OPERATIONDOCTOR, --手术医生 ss.OperationName as OPERATIONNAME --手术名称 from surg_make.v_patient_info_gys br left join gys.operation_master_gys ss on br.PatientCode=ss.PatientCode where 1=1 {0}

select br.病人编号 as PatientCode, br.病人姓名 as PatientName, br.性别 as PatientSex, br.出生年月 as PatientBirthday, br.年龄 as PatientAge, br.身份证号 as PatientIDCard, br.社保卡号 as sbh, br.地址 as PatientAddress, br.联系电话 as PatientPhone, br.是否具有高度传染性 as GCRX, gh.挂号系统编号 as RegisterCode, gh.急诊还是门诊 as RegisterType, gh.挂号时间 as RegisterDateTime, gh.挂号科室 as RegisterDepartment, gh.挂号号 as RegisterNumber, gh.病人编号 as GHPatientCode from view_brjbxx br left join view_ghxx gh on br.病人编号=gh.病人编号 where 1=1 {0} order by 挂号时间 Desc

select --病人基本信息 br.病人编号 as VALUE,--病人编号 br.病人姓名 as NAME, --病人姓名 br.病人姓名 as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.性别 as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.出生年月 as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 br.年龄 as PATIENTAGE,--年龄
gh.挂号系统编号 as REGISTERCODE, --挂号系统编号 gh.挂号时间 as REGISTERDATETIME, --挂号时间 gh.挂号号 as REGISTERNUMBER, --挂号序号 gh.挂号科室 as REGISTERDEPARTMENT --挂号科室 from view_brjbxx br left join view_ghxx gh on br.病人编号=gh.病人编号 where 1=1 {0} order by 挂号时间 Desc
